>I think I asked this before and forgot the answer, but what does his
>cyclone gun do? Oh, and is he firing at Liono or Dark?

No you didnt dont worry about it, I can barely rmember as he never used it
in the show. It shoots a high-energy beam of protons that can shred all but
the densest materials. It dosent have to shred the robot, apart, as that
would result in death, it can just rip him up a bit, or push him around. I
fired it at Liono, point blank.
